educations.name: Computer Science
educations.institution: Universidade Federal de São João del Rei

contests.title: F1 in Schols
contests.description: In F1 in Schools, my team SwordFish was challenged to project, test, build and race with a miniature Formula 1 car, working in Marketing and Project Management, also presenting all the work to the judges.

contests.title: Olimpíada Brasileira de Robótica
contests.description: My first programming contact, the Brazilian Robotics Olympiad, was an incredible experience, I was able for the first time to work with a team to achieve a goal, learning as much as possible along that time with Death Punch and D4RKMODE.

contests.title: Hackathon AEB
contests.description: In the hackathon of the Brazilian Space Agency, the competitors had to program a entire code for a space rover in the moon, which must follow a track, avoid obstacles and deal with terrain unevenness, all that on the sBotics Simulator.

contests.title: ANICON
contests.description: ANICON is a traditional regional event which mixes geek culture, technology and the robotics contests in partnership with Casa da Robótica. My team (StrangerBots404), made up by 3 great friends, won the category "Fastest Line Follower".
